A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm not a fanboy\, but I've always enjoyed the franchise. This movie had a lot of visuals and fight scenes\, but by far the weakest plot of any of the previous 7. Many parts were cheesy and some even cringy. It felt less like Star Wars and more like a random Disney/Marvel movie. You could feel the things they were adding in just to sell toys. For a normal movie\, I would give it 6/10. For a Star Wars movie 1/10.
